get.description: Lists information about all versions of the API.
Returns detailed information about the specified version of the API.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

post.description: Creates a replica of the source instance, as specified by the value of the `replica_of` attribute.

get.summary: List all replicas and replica source database instances
get.description: Lists the status and information for all replicas and replica sources.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID for the specified database instance.

put.description: Associates a specified database instance with a configuration group.

get.description: Lists status and details for a specified replica.

patch.description: Detaches the specified replica instance from its replication source instance.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID for the specified database instance.

post.description: Restarts the database service on the instance.

parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID for the specified database instance.

post.description: Creates a new database within the specified instance.

get.description: Lists databases for the specified instance.

parameters.description: The instance ID for the specified database instance.

parameters.description: The name for the specified database.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID for the specified database instance.

post.description: Creates a user for the specified database instance.

get.description: Lists the users in the specified database instance.

put.description: Changes the database password of one or more users.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID for the specified database instance.

parameters.name: name

delete.description: Deletes the user identified by {name} for the specified database instance.

get.description: Lists the specified user's name and a list of databases that the user can access.

put.description: Modifies one or more of the following for the specified user: name, password, and host from which the user is allowed to connect to the database.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID for the specified database instance.

parameters.name: name

get.description: Shows a list of all databases a user has access to.

put.description: Grants access for the specified user to one or more databases for the specified instance.

parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID for the specified database instance.

parameters.name: name
databaseName

delete.description: Removes access to the specified database for the specified user.

parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

get.description: Returns true if root user is enabled for the specified database instance or false otherwise.

get.description: Lists all defined configuration groups for the tenant.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

parameters.name: configId
parameters.description: The configuration ID for the specified configuration group.

get.description: Lists details for the specified configuration group.

patch.description: Updates some of the configuration parameters associated with the specified configuration group.

put.description: Replaces all of the configuration parameters associated with the specified configuration group.

delete.description: Deletes the specified configuration group. No message body is expected in the request.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account ID of the owner of the specified instance.

parameters.name: datastoreId
parameters.description: The ID for the specified datastore.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: The version for the specified datastore.

parameters.name: parameterId
parameters.description: The parameter that may be configured for the specified datastore and version.

get.description: Lists the details of a specified configuration parameter that may be configured on the system.
